dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool reports three measures of overall conditional independence, a conditional independence (CI) ratio and the Agterberg-Cheng test of conditional independence. The thrid measure is reported as the Over CI. Such a test test is necessary because Weights of Evidence, a Bayesian method, assumes conditional independence of the evidence with regards to the training sites. Conditional dependency typically inflates the posterior probability. The inputs for this tool are from the Calculate Response tool.

tool.name: AgterbergChengCITest

param.name: ps_raster
param.dialogReference: Post Probability Standard Deviation raster from Calculate Response

param.name: training_sites
param.dialogReference: Training Sites feature layer used in Calculate Response.

param.name: Unit_Area__sq_km
param.dialogReference: The Unit Area should be the same value used in previous tools used for this Wofe model. See the Help file in Calculate Weights for more information on Unit Area.

param.name: ci_test_file
param.dialogReference: Pathname of saved test file. A text file saving the information from the Agterberg-Cheng Conditional Independence test.

tool.summary: This tool reports three measures of overall conditional independence, a conditional independence (CI) ratio and the Agterberg-Cheng test of conditional independence. The thrid measure is reported as the Over CI. Such a test test is necessary because Weights of Evidence, a Bayesian method, assumes conditional independence of the evidence with regards to the training sites. Conditional dependency typically inflates the posterior probability. The inputs for this tool are from the Calculate Response tool.
